JobDescription: We're seeking an experienced HR manager to lead our HR team and ensure our company attracts, retains, and develops top talent.
JobResponsibility: Develop and implement HR policies and procedures. Oversee recruitment, training, and development of employees. Manage employee relations and performance management. Ensure compliance with legal requirements and industry standards. Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in HR management.
EducationalRequirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field.
Experiences: 7+ years of experience in HR management or related field.
